message: I think this is a fair division.  I get the majority since I'm the one making the first offer, but I still want to be fair to you.
Alice, your offer was quite cheeky! Let's be reasonable. I'm proposing a 60/40 split in my favor. Consider that due to inflation, the total amount is already shrinking.
I'm willing to give you a slightly bigger share this time, Bob.  Let's make a deal before the money shrinks further!
